entry.summary: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NIOBRARA...NORTHWESTERN GOSHEN...NORTHERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 958 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glendo, or 25 miles southeast of Douglas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.

entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:59PM MDT until September 10 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NIOBRARA...NORTHWESTERN GOSHEN...NORTHERN PLATTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CONVERSE COUNTIES... At 958 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glendo, or 25 miles southeast of Douglas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:43PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTY THROUGH 1015 PM MDT... At 942 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Spotted Horse, or 41 miles east of Sheridan, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail.

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued September 09 at 5:57PM MDT until September 10 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 679 IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1200 AM MDT FOR THE FOLLOWING LOCATIONS WY . WYOMING COUNTIES INCLUDED ARE CAMPBELL CONVERSE CROOK GOSHEN NIOBRARA PLATTE
